* BrightBlade kept her smile as she saw Perdabot walk up to her, still 
leaning against the tree. Hearling him growl was nothing that even phased 
her, knowing that the Alliance was beneath her Predacon heritige. A lession 
she had learned while watching her Lord, Hell Beast.
To her they were dirt, grungy dogs that simply deserved to get their butts 
whopped when ever they cam within sight. At least, that was how she saw 
them.
However, she WAS fairly impressed of how they mannaged to capture the 
Maximals Third In Command and that other mutt, Tavatron was her 
name...wasn't it.
She snickered evily at the name, she remembered fighting THAT one. But then 
she remembered just whom she was almost forced to fight just because she 
picked a battle with the she-wolf, Dinobot. Now THERE, she was out-matched. 
No hope of leaving the field alive.
But then she snickered again: Herself, going after his percious Tavatron.
Any bot whom was blind could see that there was feelings there, feelings 
that involved the spark. But it was also a weakness. One that could be 
exploited greatly.
BrightBlade made a mental note about such a thing, something to remember 
then next time she came up against Dinobot's little girlfriend.
But then she looked back at Perndabot, his gun now level with her chest. The 
Alliance had done well, for dirt covered hounds.
She looked up into his face, the same defiying smile on her face.*

" You need not remind me, I know."

* Her voice was polite and she had no harshness in it, simply stating her 
fact without any insolent actions. She didn't want to cause trouble today, 
just get back towards her journey towards the Cybertronien Fire.
BrightBlade reached out and ran her fingure over the berrel of Perdabot's 
gun, then looking at the fingure plainly as if checking for dust.
She looked back to him.*

" Nice gun. Anyway, I have to congradulate you, on recently capturing Iron 
Raptor and that Tavatron...quite a feat I'd say."

* She then crossed her arms again and leaned against the tree, in no hurry 
to leave her current position.*
